course.title: The Webwork Framework

programs.program: Graduate in Complementary Studies in Applied Informatics: Java Development for the Enterprise

course.tagline: The WebWork framework implements a simple command/ business-logic and MVC design.
course.description: Webwork provides out-of-the-box functionality developers need to build well-designed applications that are modular and reusable. Starting with "Hello World" the Webwork way, the course immerses the student in practical, how-to material. You will soon know how to configure WebWork and gradually and incrementally master the robust and powerful uses of the framework.

contents.topic: Handling data and displaying content with Expression Language and Tag Libraries
Inversion of Control and WebWork actions
Integration of web applications into the Hibernate persistence framework
